title: Loving Jenny
description: Jenny May hoped that her stay on a quiet, peaceful farm would help her forget the terrifying ordeal she'd been through. Country fairs and homemade strawberry ice cream did lift her spirits a little, but the couldn't erase the memories and the bad dreams. Now, though, a handsome - and very persistent - veterinarian seemed determined to do just that.Lucas Tate was an expert at treating pain without much feedback from his patients. But Jenny was hurting inside, and that would require a special kind of medicine...the kind Jenny would have to let him get close enough to administer. The pretty newcomer with the sad eyes was keeping her distance, but Lucas was intent on convincing Jenny that he was her best cure...
author: Theresa Weir
